name: Killer Mobile Software
description:
Killer Mobile Â® Software + Development Company has been developing cutting edge, quality mobile applications since 2003, but our experience in the mobile industry reaches back much farther than this. Our team consists of Mobile Development Professionals with over 40 combined years experience, coding some of the most well known mobile software around. However, writing code is just half the story.
We have our finger on the pulse of this ever-changing industry & offer consultation services to help you break into the the exciting world of mobile or if you're already in it, we can help your business reach new heights. We offer Software Development & Consultation in the following areas: Symbian C++ (S60) Windows Mobile Android iPhone QT Maemo/Meego Blackberry Java (MIDP 1.0 & MIDP 2.0, J2ME Polish) OTA Application Delivery SMS Systems & Custom SMS apps Mobile Security & Tracking Solutions Mobile GPS
